Detailed Description

Performs the actions necessary to grab the drawing info from the dialog box and set the ImageDraw properties accordingly.

Parameters:
ImageDraw A new instance of ImageDraw class that will contain the new values.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

UI::Dialogs::DrawingDialog::DrawingDialog ( ImageDraw  imageDraw  )  [inline]

Constructor that sets the values of the dialog based on the current ImageDraw settings.

Parameters:
imageDraw The ImageDraw object that contains the current settings.
